name: After Rain Comes
description: I know, I know! The power's down in sectorâ€” Oh, hey. A flash flood took out some of our solar panels in Buried City, and the generators only hold on for so long. Do us all a solid when you're up there, OK?
objectives: Find the flooded solar panels nearby the Grandioso Apartments
Repair the solar panels using 5 Wires and 2 Batteries
